Download Codelists

Source: R/metadata.R
download_codelists.Rd

Downloads codelists for ISTAT datasets using a deduplicated cache structure. Codelists are stored by their ID (e.g., CL_FREQ) rather than by dataset, reducing redundant storage since many codelists are shared across datasets.

Usage

download_codelists(
  dataset_ids = NULL,
  force_update = FALSE,
  cache_dir = "meta"
)

Arguments

dataset_ids

Character vector of dataset IDs. If NULL, downloads for all available datasets

force_update

Logical indicating whether to force update of cached codelists

cache_dir

Character string specifying the directory for caching codelists

Value

A named list of codelists keyed by dataset ID (e.g., "X534_50"), where each element is a data.table with codelist information

Examples

if (FALSE) { # \dontrun{
# Download codelists for specific datasets
codelists <- download_codelists(c("150_908", "150_915"))

# Download all available codelists
all_codelists <- download_codelists()
} # }
